Author: M00nSugar
Text: I hear ya pal. A lot of people don't know how invalidating saying this shit can be. I'm so sorry that person made you feel like this.   I have OCD (managed currently, thankfully) and can't help getting a bit ticked off when people say things like "I'm soooo OCD I hate clutter!" Like no dude, you're just neat. OCD was pure psychological agony and made me want to die every minute of every day but whatevs I guess ğŸ¤·ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸  People seriously need reminding that mental health disorders are not personality traits!
